    columns=None,
    aggfunc="mean",
    fill_value=None,
    margins=False,
    dropna=True,
    margins_name="All",
    observed=False,
) -> "DataFrame":

    columns = _convert_by(columns)

        fill_value=fill_value,
        margins=margins,
        dropna=dropna,
        margins_name=margins_name,
